title: Are We Less Free Than Mexico Now? | Guest: Janice Dean | 2/1/21
description:
After almost a year of government telling people they can’t work, big businesses are doing just fine. Glenn and Stu go over the latest in the GameStop stock saga and backlash against Robinhood. Is Mexico the freer economy now? Pat Gray joins to talk how silver is the next GameStop and how vastly different equity is from equality. A $15 minimum wage would crush small businesses. Fox News senior meteorologist Janice Dean breaks down the latest in Andrew Cuomo’s nursing home scandal. Is this a prelude to the brave new world? Glenn explains how fast America is becoming an oligarchy. Dr. Fauci now says science doesn’t yet support double masking, so is it all marketing? The CDC will require masks on public transportation. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
